data.text: This game had no things it just. It was kind of straight to the point. There was something covering my view of the character. It was really bad. It was trying to saw me stuff and it was just a really bad game. It didn't even have any interactive stuff. It was just left or right, but the alphabet's remained cute and it was like 2D, but not 2. The the elevations were really bad. It's just a bad game overall. Never act alive for Eddie Wong.It was just a little weird and I'm not inappropriate.....

I mean, its a good app, but the CRAZY amount of ads is INSANE. Every 2 seconds of the game, i get an ad. And if we choose like emo hair or smt, make the choices match with it. And like at least make it to where we can buy things with the coins, because if we cant buy anything then whats even the point of coding coins in there for no reason? Please fix this for a better review.

This game is as advertised, but it has advertisements very frequently. I spent probably 70% - 80% of the time watching ads and about 7% of the time clicking the arrow down on ads in this game. You can not play it offline as it will not let you. Love the artwork, but it's not worth the plethora of ads.

So it's a good game but the only problem is THE ADDS COME UP LATERALY EVER 2-4 SECONDS.It could be just little pop ups or full on adds and even if you say no to an offer it plays them,so I would recommend just watching the add.Other that that thought it's a good game and I like the music, regardless of what other people say.

The game itself seems fun, however it's incredibly difficult to actually play when the ads on the bottom of the screen continually pop up to cover half of the screen. Not like a regular pop up, but worse. In addition to actual pop up ads. "Game" is 85% ads. Deleting immediately.

Installed game, launched game, loading bar filled and completed, you'd think that means gameplay well you'd be wrong I got an ad immediately after the game loaded didn't even get to try the game before I got an ad. Tried to play offline to avoid ads since most games allow that. But this one for some reason doesn't. Says some things unavailable offline please check connection. So forced to have ads in this malware disguised as a "game".

This app is the worst I just downloaded it now and play But suddenly the ads just pop up and it looks really big and you are not able to start the game since the ads won't disappear because it covers where you press to start the game. It's okay if the ads is just a small size but it's freaking big!!! The creator of this app is 100% dumb

There are way to many adds . It is a good game over all ,but the adds are just too much and the one that pop's up at the bottom you will put it down but it just pop's up again and is super annoying. So please get rid of it and maybe I will get it again.

This game has way to many ads. Unless you want ad after ad ever two seconds I'd recommend but for me it's a no I would have played it if the ads didn't have to be so annoying. Like the first time you download it BOOM theres ad after ad and after every ad theres another one that covers half the screen!!! Wouldn't recommend at all it's a no for me👎

This is a good game for me. But the problem is it has too many ads which is annoying. The second annoying thing is when theres a cover thing which i cannot be able to see clearly what is my look. If u removed it, i will increase my rate but with only 1+ star. And if u fix the ads, (the problem is it has too many ads everytime) i will increase my rate again and its gonna be 5 stars. So please fix this. But its actually a good game i enjoyed it but a little bit.

The amount of ads on this game is phenomenal 😂 normally I dont care much about ads but this is an ad before starting the game, a banner ad that's present throughout the game and that pops up over half the screen mid-game. Then there's ads between every "win". The game itself is meh and doesn't have any particular appeal aside from passing time.

The app is good but, I cant even last till the shirt part and an ad pops up! And sometimes I'd have to watch an ad for some new options and it really sucks. And whenever I battle people I can't even get through it with no ads! Give us a break. I can't even make an outfit

Way too many ads, at the bottom an ad pops up and I click on it while I'm tapping when it tells me too. Every 30 seconds an ad pops up while I'm dressing up the character. Without ads, it would be 3 stars. It's mid IF it had no ads. I don't recommend but I would try to play it at least once if you would like to play it.

ads are overwhelming and annoying every 5 seconds or so a ad will pop up and makes the game unbelievably annoying and unfun. I wouldn't recommend downloading this app unless you like ads (I'm sure no one does I hope) but I will give it 0 stars. Can't even play offline to get rid of ads pretty stupid game would be really fun is the ads are gone or removed!
Ads are too intrusive to play the game. They take up 75% of the screen. And it'll ask you to rate the game and block out the entire screen until you do with no option to close it out. Hell no.
I woukd give zero starts if I could. Literally just downloaded it. Plays 1 round and then an ad popped up, watched that one then less than 10 seconds later another ad popped up.

If I could give this 0 stars, I would. Too many Ads. And the ad banner at the bottom of the screen pops up every other second and covers half the screen. I mean, if the ad banner stayed a banner at the bottom of the screen, then that's fine. Then it would be a very much enjoyable game. Otherwise, it's not.

Okay the problem is the adds the game is really good but the ads pop up 24/7 like I cannot enjoy the game how I want to without the adds popping up every second i just going to say you need to fix that problem and so I can enjoy the GAME

Typically I don't mind ads but you literally get a ad avery 3 seconds, on top of that there is a constant banner throughout the game. Like I'm not even kidding, the amount of ads make it impossible to actually play. I would not waste your time with this.

First off there's an ad that covers half of the screen. You take the ad off and it comes right back. Second off there's constant pop-ups. These pop-ups make a very hard to play the game. I would not recommend

Too much ads on this game if you're going to put ads at least make it those types of ads that are short so we don't have to wait for 50 seconds just to end a ads and if you don't like none of the items you have to watch a add until you get the item you like which means you will have to watch more than one ads
too many ads. it's a good game but the ads keeps bother me. it's ok for add some ads but for this game it's too many to the point that I feel annoyed. like everytime i tap the screen the ads appear.

The reason i rated this game 1 star is because i cant even get through the first part of the game which is the photo part, there is an ad banner covering half of the screen. Also there is not a X when you finish taking the picture, please fix this!?!
The second I opened the app, there was an ad thay covered half the screen and blocked the game. The ads are insane on this game and makes it annoying to play.
So. Many. Ads. Too many ads If I could play the game without being interrupted by an pop-up add every 10 seconds, quite literally, that would be great

This game is riddled with ads! You get one that pops up from the bottom and takes up half the screen and then you get ads like every 20 seconds and it's ridiculous. Not even worth trying to play around them.
Dude! It would be so fun if it wasn't chalk full of ads! Literally every second you get a new ad! I like it but it's basically unplayable!
Too many ads, literally can barely play the game. Don't play unless youd like to spend 90% of your time hitting X's and down buttons on ads and 10% actually making choices.

This game would be so good if there wasn't so many ads. It's like every single second there's an ad popping up. And every single time I could the x on the ads it takes me right to the sponsor. I would not recommend this game to anybody.

These ads are so stupid, they pop ups every 5 seconds and take up half the screen I would keep this game downloaded but I can't even play it without accidentally clicking an ad get rid of the ads and the game is pretty good
Just to many ads I can't even play the game for 5 minutes without an ad. It could be fun but it just gets annoying and my level of patience isn't that high.
This app says it doesn't collect data. it's lying. There's components from BYTE DANCE (tiktok), and it is intrusive. Delete this app ASAP! Not to mention, the ads are out of control!

Good game when I downloaded it but The problems are the every 3-5 second app the pop up adds are very annoying and I dont understand the purpose of it i hope u fix this big issue other than that its an ok game

The ads are atrocious. Absolutely would not play more than 5 minutes of this game. Well you couldnt anyway unless you want to watch 12 ads and have a ad pop up and cover half the screen the whole time. Yea no, do better.

Absolute trash it keeps on popping up the exact same thing he shows me to add and I'm tired of and it had the strategy to give me another add after I complete it But I would play this game again if it was less laggy. Fix your game Dumbo

It's 1% game then 99% adds it's so stupid. U can't press 1 thing without a add comting to u. The slide on the bottom takes half the screen. ( I HIGHLY RECOMMEND NOT TO DOWNLOAD THIS GAME ITS MOSTLY ADDS!)
People say there ads but there pops ups! I really like this game its really fun if your bored. I got this when I was in a car and it helped the 7 hours left in my car drive!♡♡

This game is not the best why will tell you 1 a lot of adds 2 I can not play the game with out the adds in the way 3 it is so annoying how when I put on the hair a add pop up and I had to watch it 4 it is so hard to play with all the adds and now I am not going to play this annoying game I will give the annoying game a 0

this game is so fun!! the only thing is the adds, there are nany adds and there is something on the bottom of my screen that keeps on Blocking the choices but other than that, its a reallly cool, fun game!
Looks like a really fun game well NO IF I COULD PUT ZERO STARS I WOULD DO IT this is a fun game but there are so many ads and thing that pop up and annoy you and covers half your screen:(!

The ads are continuously popping up and covers half of the screen!!!! This is so annoying and frustrating!!!! Ughhh!!!! This game is going to cause me to take anger management, seriously!!!! I'm unistalling before I throw my phone!!!!
The game is fun ,nice graphics and animation.but the amount of ads in the game are too much for me and too distracting.
too much ads, i'm getting tired to press back or home everytime the ads appears. i would rather uninstall it than to have bug on my phone because of the ads
Its nice but ads keep on popping up any time, sorry but i have to give this a 3 star because the ads are really annoying and i cant even play normally.
it has too much ads. I can't handle the ads. But I love the music and the everything else. But there's just too much ads
Trash game, ads cover content and stop game play constantly. There is no break from the over bloated ads.
So many ads covered half or all the screen most of the time. Made it really hard to play the game.

It's Fun and Very Challenging also Relaxing But There is Literally Too Much adds, Like When I try to get them away, They just Move me to It's Website, Like Ads Are Popping Everywhere, And I can't Play The Game so Can You Fix It, It Gets On My Nerves. 😊
this game is the best you can dress up your character and the outfits revealing is such a good surprise and good for kids to play if they want to be fashion designers 👍😀😊
A lot of pop up ads and..half of your screen will showing ads which can't be avoided.
All you get to do on the game is watch ads, you play for 2 seconds and then an ad will play for a minute. If there were an option to pay for no ads that would be handy.
The game is good and all, but there are way too many ads. Every time I click on something, there's an ad it gets boring after awhile there are only so many choices 3 stars
Way to many ad. There is an ad every 2 seconds. You can not do anything without an ad popping up.
Ads every 5 seconds there's always an ad that keeps popping up and blocking half of the screen!!
You can't choose two options but you can decide which outfit you like. This was an amazing game If you want to try you have to and you love this app I rate this app 9/10
Woww what to say it was okay for like 2 seconds ads kept coming up everyone 2 to 3 seconds and could not play the game as half the screen at the bottom kept on popping up
I gave it to you stars because this is stupid.Why make a name if you can't play it without watching a 10 like too many ADS. I don't like it.
The game is ok.dont get many outfits to choose from and the ads are horrible they interrupt your game the ads come on in the middle of ur game its horrible

I think this is a good game because everybody can choose the outfit and it's just a good game it's for any age even if it's a 1-year-old you can still play it because now my sister plays it and she's the only one one and two months is a good game
way too many adds. I didn't even get to load the game, and it gave me like 4 adds all at once. Definitely, don't get this game.

game is so fun you get to pick your character outfits is so funny I I picked I picked all of the outfits with my eyes closed and I got a cute cute girl I loved it play this game play this game and give it five stars and you tap it you can you tap the thing and you said I want something new you can get something new and that's why I like it is a fun game you can get a lot of stuff and it's very fun you can dress up your character and I say laugh left or right is fun I love this the game five star
Its ads all the time. Even when one doesnt play there is a pop up at the bottom that keeps getting in the way of playing the game
it's so annoying and whenever I click almost anything it takes me to a different app on my Android tablet and there's always a little long table hanging up on the screen

I love that game and like other game there is not add and also offline I love it this game is so incredibly and made my day when I downloaded and can't stop playing this and my sister also love this game and l will also tell my friend to download load when they download the game the also love it and the ay this game is so so so adorable ❤️❤️🤩and pulls can you make a game like world and like a real life and first ask do you know that how to play and if someone know so you should practice them ❤️
THERE ARE JUST TOO MANY ADDS! I can't even play half the time. If you can handle soooooooo many adds then go ahead, but be prepared.
Great game but too many ads. Would give zero stars if I had the option just based on the amount of ads.
This game seems fun but I can't stand when the adds pop up and when I hit new options it doesn't work .. that is why I dislike this game💢
Too many adds every time I click on the ^ it always clicks on it and there's like these pop up adds on the bottom of the screen no cares😭😭
The footer ad pops up far too often, even during and over the segments where you have to tap rapidly
It's nice I love it and so glad it doesn't have ads because I would go crazy and delete play store I hate ads if anything comes up I'm not play just deleting

I hate it because it gives you lots of and and it is lagy for me also there is a thing at the bottom of the screen that you have to hit the x and I says I didn't hit the x and I got mad and thro my phone.
LOTS of adds and hard to get rid of them but the game in general besides the adds is pretty fun would have gave five stars if it wasn't for the adds
It's a very cute game, but there are so many pop-up ads and video ads that ruin the experience.
this game I great but there are so many adds u can't even play it properly I would suggest getting a different version that doesn't have as many adds
There's to many adds cant stand it is kinda good there's an add in the bottom of my ipad cant even see would not recommend downloading for your kids too much sexual outfits

Absolutely disappointed. Game seemed really fun and I was excited to play. Once I actually opened it there was about 3 ads for 5 minutes of gameplay. I wish I was joking. I could barely play without getting ads every option. Also, why are there ads at the bottom?! If there was only the first problem it might've been playable but ads at the bottom is an instant "NO" for me. Uninstalled before the first round was even over. I've played game with a bunch of ads, but this one was over the roof!

it so much fun bor it like play left or right it is left or right it so much fun bor can you make more left or Right games please I well do anything you need are 10 years please make more left or right games please and thank you make

Cute game and I would give it five stars if it weren't for the number of ads. I would not recommend it simply because of this.
This game is good and all but there's too many ads and when I turn off my wifi and mobile data I cant play like srsly don't download this game unless you love ads
DON'T SAY SOME ACTIONS AREN'T AVAILABLE OFFLINE IF "SOME ACTIONS" MEANS THE ENTIRE GAME sorry its a great game I just get anoyed when stuff like that happens but it does have too many ads

the game is fun but the ads are getting on my nerves. I don't recommend this game unless u have the patience for the ads.
